entries.name: John
entries.description: A charming and kind-hearted man in his thirties who works at an art gallery. He is observant, patient, and deeply compassionate.

entries.name: Emma
entries.description: A young woman with a lovely face, but visibly self-conscious about her weight. She has a brilliant personality and is quite intelligent.

entries.name: The Café
entries.description: A cozy, well-lit café where John and Emma regularly meet. It is the main setting where their relationship develops.

sections.content: The story begins in a cozy, well-lit café where John is enjoying his morning coffee. He notices a young woman named Emma sitting across the room.
John and Emma have an accidental encounter when they both reach for the last muffin on the counter. They share a smile and John instinctively apologizes.
